HomePage.welcomeTitle: Welcome to my website. Feel free to look around and have fun!

news_001.title: The apples are on sale!
news_001.content: The fresh and delicious apples are coming from the Mount Fuji. There is 10 percent discount on the apples now!

news_002.title: The sale event for the orchid
news_002.content: There is a sale event for the beautiful blue orchid. Buy one get one free!
